item.description:
July 17-19 7PM
Ski Wheelers Ski Lodge
North Conway,NH

Janet M will be car pooling from Norwich, VT; Redscarlet56@gmail.com; 802-295-5109
Leaving early on Friday AM to bike in North Conway on Friday. Trip is about 2 1/2 hrs
I am not the HOST; Please send the check to Cheryl: address listed below.

Last year had 18 people from meetup out of 65 who went down the river. So please join me and my friends for a weekend you will not forget. This is a fun filled weekend of meeting new people and discovering new ways to enjoy the great outdoors on the cheap side.
Cost: $128 which includes meal and lodging (Friday and Saturday nights), includes canoe or kayak, $25 off if you bring your own boat. The lodging is clean but like camping indoors.

Friday night Happy hours/a canoe, or kayak with a day on the river/ 2 breakfast/picnic lunch/ lobster, steak or chicken dinner.

Agenda:
Friday night 7:30-11: Check in, get settled and join us for a welcoming get together; snacks, beer and wine.
Saturday 7 AM: Meet in the dining room for a make your own breakfast ( breakfast items furnished)
Pack your lunch in your own coolers, lunch foods and drinks provided to make your picnic lunch.
8:40 AM: Leave lodge for Northern Extremes ( formerly Saco Canoe) Route 16 Conway
9:00 AM: Must be at Northern Extremes for 9:00 AM shuttle LIMITED SPACE on the shuttle. Those with their own canoe/kayak should car pool to put in and arrange for a ride back to take-out. Lunch on the river, sun laughs, water battles, swimming!!
3:00-6 PM: Volleyball, pool, ping-pong, darts, socializing or relaxing after having a hard day on the river.
7:00 PM: Feast of lobster, steak, and BBQ Chicken at the Ski Wheelers Lodge
9:00 PM-1 AM: Informal party at the Ski Wheelers Lodge, music, dance and pool and ping pong, (BYOB)
SUNDAY: Wake up fresh coffee, and have breakfast at your leisure, enjoy the day bike, hike or shop
Take a river swim, or hang out to get to know your new friends.
WHAT TO BRING: smaller cooler, sweatshirt, or fleece ( it can get cool on the river) allow for the possiblity of rain, and bring foul weather gear ( we go if it rains), a dry bag or large zip lock bag to keep things dry ( such as your camera), an arsenal of water-ejecting weaponry ( please no water balloons), Insect repellent and SUNSCREEN SPF 30, beach towel, bathing suit, watershoesd, sandals, or old sneakers, SLEPING BAG, or linens & blankets, pillow and bath towel ( members remind your guests).
YOUR SENSE OF ADVENTURE, A WILLINGESS TO HELP OUT, AND YOUR SENSE OF HUMOR
Please send your check to: ( we only accept checks from members of meetup, only)
Ski Wheelers Ski Club by JUNE 29, 2009

Cheryl Slowik
11 Sparhawk Street #2F
Brighton, Mass 02135
Choice: Lobster, chicken or steak
Please order only what you can eat
We need accurate kayak/ canoe count
Deduct $25 from the package cost of $80 if you are bringing your won canoe/ kayak
item.how_to_find_us: I will be already there. / Will have meetup sign with Janet M

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: NORTH CONWAY Canoe/Kayak Weekend
